name: UNNotificationAction
desc: A task your app performs in response to a notification that the system delivers.

items.name: init(identifier: String, title: String, options: UNNotificationActionOptions)
items.desc: Creates an action object by using the specified title and options.

items.name: init(identifier: String, title: String, options: UNNotificationActionOptions, icon: UNNotificationActionIcon?)
items.desc: Creates an action object by using the specified title, options, and icon.

items.name: var identifier: String
items.desc: The unique string that your app uses to identify the action.

items.name: var title: String
items.desc: The localized string to use as the title of the action.

items.name: var icon: UNNotificationActionIcon?
items.desc: The icon associated with the action.

items.name: var options: UNNotificationActionOptions
items.desc: The behaviors associated with the action.

items.name: struct UNNotificationActionOptions
items.desc: The behaviors you can apply to an action.
